p: Preclinical evidence. This herbal medicine has not been experimentally proven for respiratory disease. Aqueous and ethanolic extracts of P. amboinicus present in vitro anti-inflammatory activity ( Devi and Periyanayagam, 2009; Ravikumar et al., 2009; Janakiraman and Somasundaram, 2014). The active constituents of P. amboinicus present inhibitory effects on pro-inflammatory cytokines TNF-α, IL-6, and IL-1β ( Yashaswini and Vasundhara, 2011).
